elements.label: Harald Blomkvist
elements.description: Once he was a rising star in the classical music circles of Northern Europe. Now he spends most days alone in a quiet house.

elements.label: The new 'New Scandinavian' Theater
elements.description: The latest incarnation of a constantly reforming theater company. Here new forms of expression are married to the old.

slots.label: Song
slots.description: I should begin my performance, by declaring my intentions, my method, my staging.

slots.label: Story to trade
slots.description: The story I'm willing to share in order to get them to share theirs.

elements.label: Baruch and Sons, Expert Luthiers and Further.
elements.description: An unassuming shop nestled in the oldest streets of the oldest neighborhoods. They work for an exclusive Clientel, and do not permit entry into their workshop easily.

slots.label: A Request
slots.description: I have been recommended to Baruch not only as a client, but also as ally. He has asked me to supply him with Spiteful Resin.

elements.label: Baruch and Sons, Expert Luthiers and Further.
elements.description: An unassuming shop nestled in the oldest streets of the oldest neighborhood of Copenhagen. The air is heavy with the smells of pinewood and with music in potentia.
